title: Set of functions in example RcppArmadillo package — RcppArmadillo-Functions
text: rcpparma_hello_world() return value, displays   message console.  rcpparma_outerproduct() returns numeric matrix computed   outer (vector) product x.  rcpparma_innerproduct() returns double computer inner   (vector) product x.  rcpparma_bothproducts() returns list outer   inner products.

title: Set of functions in example RcppArmadillo package — RcppArmadillo-Functions
text: example functions largely   self-explanatory. main benefit demonstrate write   function using Armadillo C++ classes,   function accessible R.
